trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The `Scroll` event occurs when the user changes the value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: `Scroll`使用者變更捲軸的值時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This event can result from a variety of actions, such as clicking a scroll bar arrow, pressing the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW, or dragging the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件可以來自各種不同的動作，例如按一下捲軸箭號、 按向上鍵或向下箭號，或拖曳捲動方塊。

trans-unit.source: The ScrollEventArgs specifies the type of scroll event that occurred and the new value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: ScrollEventArgs 指定發生的捲動事件的類型和捲軸的新值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A> property to determine the scroll bar orientation for the `Scroll` event.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>屬性來判斷的捲軸列方向`Scroll`事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `Scroll` event occurs for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controls.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref>類別使用的給定的值<> *> 和<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
The new value for the scroll bar.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.OldValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref>類別使用的給定的值<> *>， <> </> *>，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
The old value for the scroll bar.
The new value for the scroll bar.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref>類別使用的給定的值<> *>， <> </> *>，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
The new value for the scroll bar.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.OldValue*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref>類別使用的給定的值<> *>， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，以及<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
The old value for the scroll bar.
The new value for the scroll bar.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> of the scroll bar.
The numeric value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> property will be changed to.
Gets the old <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> of the scroll bar.
The numeric value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> property contained before it changed.
Gets the scroll bar orientation that raised the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得捲軸列方向引發<xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You would typically use the ScrollOrientation property to determine the scroll bar orientation that raised the `Scroll` event, such as with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會使用 ScrollOrientation 屬性以判斷引發捲軸列方向`Scroll`事件，例如與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
Gets the type of scroll event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得發生的捲動事件類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
